lead_paragraph: Administrators at the university, which canceled the faculty members’ health insurance over the weekend, said pre-emptive measures were necessary to prevent a possible strike.

headline.print_headline: Anticipating Strike, a Brooklyn College Locks Out the Faculty
headline.main: L.I.U.-Brooklyn Locks Out Professors Amid Contract Dispute

snippet: Administrators at the university, which canceled the faculty members’ health insurance over the weekend, said pre-emptive measures were necessary to prevent a possible strike....
abstract: Long Island University-Brooklyn, anticipating possible strike, locks out faculty members after failing to reach agreement on new faculty union contract, which expired in August; Long Island University Faculty Federation calls lockout unprecedented move aimed at weakening its bargaining powers.
